timeline.bodyText: I think it could be protected or even private so we can avoid unexpected usages :)
timeline.author: danielezonca
danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: Simple enough; but I put it in a separate class to (1) be consistent, (2) in case it becomes more complex later.
timeline.author: manstis

timeline.message: Make zero parameter constructors private following peer review.
